featured.text: There is no death; only a change of worlds—the author delivers these reassurances to readers in this book, based on the customs of the Plains Indians in America.
The Chinese and Indians 16 it for at least 4,000 years to treat everything from headache to depression.

definition.zh_def: 印度人，指來自印度的民族或國籍的人。
definition.en_def: Indians refer to the people of India or those of Indian descent.
definition.example: Many Indians celebrate Diwali with family and friends.
